mapper.select: select d1.trip_detail_id, u1.user_id, d1.image_path, s1.sido_name, d1.title, d1.start_date, d1.end_date, u1.nickname, d1.max_capacity, d1.view, d1.created_at, timestampdiff(minute, d1.created_at, now()) as create_time, d1.content from trip_detail d1 join user u1 on d1.user_id = u1.user_id join sido s1 on d1.sido_code = s1.sido_code where d1.trip_detail_id = #{tripDetailId}

select d1.trip_detail_id, u1.user_id, d1.image_path, s1.sido_name, d1.title, d1.start_date, d1.end_date, u1.nickname, d1.max_capacity, d1.view, d1.created_at, timestampdiff(minute, d1.created_at, now()) as create_time, d1.content from trip_detail d1 join user u1 on d1.user_id = u1.user_id join sido s1 on d1.sido_code = s1.sido_code where d1.user_id = #{userId} and d1.start_date <= curdate() and d1.end_date >= curdate()
select m1.trip_detail_member_id, m1.trip_detail_id, m1.user_id, m1.star_check, u1.nickname from trip_detail_member m1 join user u1 on m1.user_id = u1.user_id where trip_detail_id = #{tripDetailId}

select * from attraction_info a2 join ( select p1.trip_date, a1.activity_order, a1.content_id from trip_plan p1 join trip_activity a1 on p1.trip_plan_id = a1.trip_plan_id where trip_detail_id = #{tripDetailId} ) p2 on a2.content_id = p2.content_id order by p2.trip_date asc, p2.activity_order asc;

select m1.trip_detail_id from trip_detail_member m1 join trip_detail t1 on m1.trip_detail_id = t1.trip_detail_id where not( (t1.start_date > #{startDate} and t1.start_date > #{endDate}) or (t1.end_date < #{startDate} and t1.end_date < #{endDate}) ) and m1.user_id = #{userId} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into trip_detail (user_id, title, content, start_date, end_date, max_capacity, created_at, sido_code, image_path) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{maxCapacity}, now(), #{sidoCode}, #{imagePath})
insert into trip_activity (trip_plan_id, content_id, activity_order) values (#{tripPlanId}, #{contentId}, #{activityOrder})
mapper.update: update trip_detail set view = view + 1 where trip_detail_id = #{tripDetailId};
